short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor and analyze webpage SEO metadata in real-time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly analyze page metadata, SEO elements, and structured data. Real-time monitoring of meta tags, Open Graph, and Twitter Cards.

MetaWatch is your real-time companion for monitoring and analyzing webpage metadata. Built for developers, SEO specialists, and content managers who need instant insight into their page's meta elements.

Key Features:
- Live meta tag monitoring (title, description, keywords)
- Social media preview validation (OpenGraph and Twitter Cards)
- Structured data inspection
- Canonical URL verification
- Internationalization (hreflang) detection
- Character count optimization guides
- Visual alerts for missing critical elements

Perfect for:
- Developers implementing SEO requirements
- Content managers verifying metadata implementation
- Digital marketers optimizing social sharing
- QA teams validating meta information

How to use:
1. Click the MetaWatch icon in your browser
2. Get instant analysis of all meta elements
3. Monitor character counts with visual guides
4. Verify social media preview data
5. Inspect structured data markup
